text: This is the best day of my life
I am feeling joyful and excited
I am smiling a lot today
I am feeling very low today
I am crying and feeling depressed
I feel afraid of the dark
I am feeling very nervous and scared
I am okay and feeling normal
I am surprised by the results
I did not see that coming
I am shocked by the news
I feel disgusted by the smell
I feel sick after seeing that
i am anxious about the exam
